subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: For the first time in two and a half seasons, the cheery success story of the New York Mets has lost some of its luster as the front office has axed two people in an effort to shake up the team.
snippet: For the first time in two and a half seasons, the cheery success story of the New York Mets has lost some of its luster as the front office has axed two people in an effort to shake up the team.
